snippet.title: Inverted Trailer
snippet.description:
You can get the demo for free at: https://moonmonsterstudios.itch.io/inverted 

Inverted is a co-op platformer game designed for two players. This version is an early prototype we made to represent the potential of the game and the mechanics. The development is currently put on hold indefinitely. We are still very passionate about this project and hope to continue on it in the future. 

We're a fairly new studio and are working on a new project at the moment.
If you want to support us, feel free to join the discord channel and ask us any question you want.
https://discord.gg/cETDEbd
